#summary Source Availability

Our project is hosted at http://gitorious.org/rowboat
To upload it:
{{{
mkdir rowboat-android
cd rowboat-android
repo init -u git://gitorious.org/rowboat/manifest.git
repo sync
}}}

Getting repo:
{{{
$ curl http://android.git.kernel.org/repo >~/bin/repo
$ chmod a+x ~/bin/repo
}}}

You can find detailed repo installing instruction and repo howto here:
{{{
http://source.android.com/download/using-repo
}}}
